creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
poem(waka)
In evening, sea breeze blowing over the Tama River of Noda in Mutsu. That made plovers cry.
Japanese: Yu_sareba shio-kaze koshite Michinoku no Noda no Tamagawa chidori naku nari
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Six Jewel Rivers in Various Provinces (Shokoku Mu Tamagawa 諸国六玉川)
title: Noda Jewel River in Mutsu Province
